# tf.graph_util.tensor_shape_from_node_def_name

### Aliases:

* `tf.contrib.lite.tf_graph_util.tensor_shape_from_node_def_name`

Defined in [`tensorflow/python/framework/graph_util_impl.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.10/tensorflow/python/framework/graph_util_impl.py).
